docs.snippet: Newly declassified U.S. intelligence documents that came to light Thursday reveal that Gen. Augusto Pinochet directly ordered the 1976 assassination of a Chilean diplomat in Washington....
docs.lead_paragraph: Newly declassified U.S. intelligence documents that came to light Thursday reveal that Gen. Augusto Pinochet directly ordered the 1976 assassination of a Chilean diplomat in Washington.

headline.main: Declassified US Docs Reveal Pinochet Ordered Killing in US
headline.print_headline: Declassified US Docs Reveal Pinochet Ordered Killing in US

docs.snippet: A previous attempt failed in 2013 despite bipartisan support. Lawmakers are poised to roll out a new version on the heels of a mass shooting in Oregon....
docs.lead_paragraph: A previous attempt failed in 2013 despite bipartisan support. Lawmakers are poised to roll out a new version on the heels of a mass shooting in Oregon.
docs.abstract: Senate Democrats begin renewed push for gun control legislation following mass shooting at Umpqua Community College in Oregon; legislative package includes both new measures and bills that have previously failed to pass.

headline.main: Senate Democrats to Renew Push for Gun Control Measures
headline.print_headline: Senate Democrats to Renew the Push for Gun Control

docs.snippet: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi is on the campaign trail in a state election that could define the rest of his term, promising jobs and development in one of the country's most backward areas, while his right-wing party pushes a Hindu agenda....
docs.lead_paragraph: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi is on the campaign trail in a state election that could define the rest of his term, promising jobs and development in one of the country's most backward areas, while his right-wing party pushes a Hindu agenda.

headline.main: In India, a Test for Modi's Economic Reforms and Hindu Agenda
headline.print_headline: In India, a Test for Modi's Economic Reforms and Hindu Agenda
